snippet.title: Arctic Awakening developer presentation - Future Games Show Spring Showcase
snippet.description:
We sat down with James Simpson to talk us through his new game Arctic Awakening, a narrative survival game. Arctic Awakening is episodic narrative adventure games coming to PC, Mac and Consoles in 2022.

#ArcticAwakening
